name: miracle-seed
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Grass moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Grass-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that raises the power of GRASS-type moves.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises the power of GRASS-type moves.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. A seed imbued with life that boosts the power of GRASS-type moves.
